articles.title: Landers Super Crazy Sale 2025 brings five days of bigger discounts and crazier deals
articles.author: BMPlus
articles.summary: Landers Superstore is launching its Super Crazy Sale 2025 from February 26 to March 2, featuring discounts on over 5,000 items. The sale includes a Piso Sale, offering items like Oreo wafers, Cannon washcloths, and Nongshim Shin Ramyun for just ₱1 with a minimum purchase. Landers Central and Doppio are also offering food deals, including French fries and ice cream for ₱1 with minimum purchases.

articles.title: Get The New Ninja Creami Swirl Before It Sells Out
articles.author: Kara Cuzzone
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Creami Swirl, an updated version of the original Ninja Creami. This new model allows users to make ice cream and also dispenses soft serve. The Ninja Creami Swirl is currently available on the brand's site and at Amazon and features 13 functions for making gelato, milkshakes, and soft serve ice cream.

articles.title: Nvidia launching AI platform to make learning American Sign Language easier
articles.author: Clare Duffy
articles.summary: Nvidia, in partnership with the American Society for Deaf Children and Hello Monday, launched 'Signs,' an AI-powered American Sign Language learning platform. The platform features a 3-D avatar, provides AI feedback on user practice, and initially includes 100 distinct signs, with plans to expand to 1,000. Nvidia aims to enable wider AI adoption and may use data from 'Signs' to develop new ASL-related products, such as improving sign recognition in video-conferencing software.

articles.title: Mobile Marketing is Said to Be the Future of E-Commerce
articles.summary: Diesel has partnered with Samsung to release a new collection for the Galaxy S23 series. Tim is launching a summer offer and promotional campaign. RaceTrac is developing and rolling out a next-generation mobile app.

articles.title: Best-selling movie projector is $71 off for a limited time on Amazon Australia
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: XuanPad launched the XuanPad Mini Projector, a compact projector with enhanced electric focus, Android OS for smart streaming, and a 180° rotatable stand for flexible viewing. The projector is available on Amazon Australia for $128.99 and features WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and HiFi speakers for immersive entertainment.

articles.title: Where can I buy the Ninja soft serve maker? Everything you need know about the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi, a soft-serve ice cream maker with 13 programs and 6 soft-serve options, capable of making frozen custard and dairy-free fruit whips. It is available for purchase at NinjaKitchen.com for $350 with free shipping, with delivery expected in early March.

articles.title: Where can I buy the Ninja soft serve maker? Everything you need know about the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi, a soft serve maker priced at $350 and available at NinjaKitchen.com, Amazon, and Crate&Barrel, and starting at $349 at Walmart. This machine features 13 one-touch programs and 6 soft-serve options, allowing users to create various soft-textured treats like frozen custard and fruit whips using the Creamerizer Paddle technology.

articles.title: Google has a new hub for tracking Pixel details
articles.author: Dallas Thomas
articles.summary: Google is planning to launch a new "Your Devices" page on the Google Store website. This page will allow users to track details like IMEI and purchase history for their Made By Google devices (Pixels, tablets, accessories). The "Your Devices" page will provide easy access to support functions, initiate repair orders, manage related subscriptions, and provide device-specific help documentation.

articles.title: Google has a new Pixel hub for tracking warranties and purchase info in one place
articles.author: Dallas Thomas
articles.summary: Google is planning to launch a "Your Devices" page on the Google Store website. The "Your Devices" page is capable of showing all of your Made By Google phones, tablets, and accessories, regardless of if you purchased them from the Google Store or a third party. The page will show details for these devices, such as the model number, IMEI, and serial number and also provide easy access to common support functions for your Pixel devices.

articles.title: Why This New Dish Soap? Lots of Cheesy Meat Dishes
articles.author: Jenn Gidman
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Dawn brand has launched PowerSuds, a new dish soap promising twice the suds and designed to cut through grease from protein-rich foods. The formula is designed to trap grease and eliminate residue from traveling and transferring across dishes.

articles.title: America's Meat Obsession Births a New Dish Soap
articles.author: Jenn Gidman
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Dawn brand has launched PowerSuds, a new dish soap promising twice the usual amount of suds that stay visibly whiter. The new formula is designed to trap grease and eliminate residue from transferring across dishes, allowing for more effective dishwashing.

articles.title: Huawei's Tri-Foldable Phone Hits Global Markets in a Show of Defiance Amid U.S. Curbs
articles.author: Eileen Ng
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Huawei Mate XT, the industry's first tri-foldable phone, at a global event in Kuala Lumpur. The phone, priced at 3,499 euros ($3,662), is touted as the thinnest foldable phone with a 10.2-inch screen.

articles.title: New cannabis device disrupts widely used tech
articles.author: Cara Wietstock
articles.summary: Zone introduces the OPTO vape pen battery, compatible with 510-threaded cartridges. It features one-touch temperature changes, functional storage with a charging dock and polycarbonate cover, and an OLED screen displaying battery life and voltage. The Zone OPTO offers three power modes indicated by unique graphics for different vapor and flavor experiences.

articles.title: Google TV Streamer 4K: A Game-Changer for Your Home Entertainment Setup?
articles.author: Jerri Ledford
articles.summary: Google launched the Google TV Streamer, a replacement for Chromecast with a redesigned form factor and remote. The Google TV Streamer includes features such as customizable remote buttons, free channels, smart home controls, and voice search, running on Google TV.

articles.title: The Verge's favorite kitchen gadgets
articles.author: Verge Staff
articles.summary: The Verge staff recommends various kitchen tools and gadgets. Among these are the Ynesoer automatic soap dispenser, Presto's basic air popper, Instant Pot, Braun MultiQuick 5 Vario Hand Blender, and Typhur InstaProbe Core thermometer, Gripstic bag sealers, Ikea Koncis garlic press, and King Arthur Baking measuring spoons.  The tools range from simple manual devices to electric gadgets, enhancing cooking and food preparation.

articles.title: Chance AI Launches on iOS with First-of-Its-Kind Visual Model
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Chance AI, a visual intelligence app, is launching on iOS on February 21st. This app allows users to snap photos and instantly receive history, themes, and related context using its dedicated VLM system. An Android version is currently in development.

articles.title: Amazon is shutting down its third-party Android app store
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Amazon Appstore will cease to be available on Android devices starting August 20, 2025. After this date, the operation of apps from the Amazon Appstore on Android hardware is not guaranteed. However, they can continue to be used on devices like [unspecified].

articles.title: The 9 Best Hair Dryers for a Salon-Level Blowout at Home, According to Cosmo Editors and Pro Hair Stylists
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: New high-tech hair dryers are equipped with infrared technology, multiple attachments, and advanced airflow for faster, healthier drying. These lightweight hair dryers aim to replicate salon-quality blowouts at home. Cosmo provides reviews of the 9 best hair dryers of 2025.

articles.title: Sleep hot? These 'cloud-like' cooling pillows are over 80% off — just $21 a pair
articles.summary: Cozsinoor is launching bed pillows, a two-pack sold at \$21 with a huge discount. The pillows are filled with down alternative and encased in a breathable cover and thousands of fans reported that pillows are very comfortable.

articles.title: LG CONTINUES ENDANGERED SPECIES AWARENESS CAMPAIGN IN NEW YORK TIMES SQUARE
articles.author: LG Electronics USA
articles.summary: LG launched a stunning anamorphic 3D display on its Times Square billboard. The display kicks off 2025 with a demonstration of LG's latest technology.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT vs Samsung Galaxy Z Fold
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT camera review
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: Huawei foldable smartphone 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT price and features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT LTPO OLED display
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT thickness and durability
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT Ultimate, a premium bi-fold smartphone, in international markets.

articles.title: This electric cleaning brush will transform your home
articles.author: Laura Millar
articles.summary: HOTO has launched the Electric Spin Scrubber, a handheld cleaning device designed to simplify and enhance cleaning tasks. The device includes six brush head attachments and an extension rod. The scrubber is effective in removing grime from surfaces like bathroom tiles, sinks, and mirrors.

articles.title: Suzy Unveils Suzy Speaks: A New Era In Conversational Research
articles.summary: Suzy launched Suzy Speaks, an AI-powered voice-driven research methodology designed to revolutionize how brands gather consumer insights. This product integrates with existing research and uses AI to moderate conversations, probe, clarify, and analyze data in real-time, reducing the time and cost of traditional qualitative research. Suzy also unveiled a new brand identity and website redesign alongside the launch.

articles.title: Oppo wireless file transfer Mac
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is introducing a new cross-platform integration feature on the Oppo Find N5.

articles.title: O+ Connect Mac support
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is introducing a new feature on the Oppo Find N5. This feature enhances cross-platform integration.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 foldable features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is introducing a new feature on the Oppo Find N5 to enhance cross-platform integration.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 file sharing with Mac
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is introducing a new cross-platform integration feature on the Oppo Find N5. This feature expands the functionality of the Oppo Find N5.

articles.title: Suzy Unveils Suzy Speaks: A New Era In Conversational Research
articles.author: Suzy
articles.summary: Suzy launched Suzy Speaks, a new voice-driven research methodology. This AI-moderated tool enables brands to capture qualitative consumer insights at scale. It aims to modernize consumer research with real-time, conversational insights.

articles.title: Lululemon launches new Glow Up collection
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Lululemon has launched Glow Up, a new collection of active and lifestyle wear designed to provide a 'held-in sensation', support, and sculpting. The collection, created based on customer feedback, features a re-engineered version of Ultralu fabric and includes a Super-High-Rise Crop, a Onesie, and a medium-support tank top.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 offer
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is offering significant discounts across its entire product range. This presents an opportunity for consumers to upgrade their technology.

articles.title: Samsung smartphone exchange offer
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is offering substantial discounts across its complete product range, signalling an opportune moment for consumers to upgrade their existing technology.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of noise-cancelling headphones to under £50
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Soundcore by Anker Q30 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones are available on Amazon for £45.99, reduced from £79.99, featuring noise cancellation and long battery life. Philips True Wireless Bluetooth In-ear Headphones are also available for £39.99, discounted from £49.99 at Debenhams.

articles.title: Venting at Democrats and Fearing Trump, Liberal Donors Pull Back Cash
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes by targeting wealthy young parents and couples. They are working with an agency to create profiles of these potential customers and will use these profiles to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: An almost-perfect Kindle? Why the Colorsoft left me torn
articles.author: Amanda Kondolojy
articles.summary: Amazon re-launched the Kindle Colorsoft, an e-reader with a 7-inch color E Ink display, after fixing an initial manufacturing issue. Priced at $280, it targets comic and graphic novel readers, offering vibrant color and a premium reading experience, with a battery life of eight weeks and 32GB of storage, but it does not include a wireless charger.

articles.title: Looking for a new shampoo? Experts reveal there's 'no need to splurge' on expensive brands
articles.author: Shannon Garlin
articles.summary: L'Oreal Elvive line features shampoos formulated with protein and ceramides for damaged hair and hyaluronic acid for dry hair. Tresemme offers a hydrating shampoo with hyaluronic acid to restore moisture. SheaMoisture's Strengthen and Restore shampoo includes shea butter, castor oil, and peppermint oil for damaged and chemically processed hair, while Kristin Ess offers a deep-cleaning shampoo for all hair types developed by celebrity hairstylist Kristin Ess and CeraVe offers shampoos  developed with dermatologists.

articles.title: This stylish showerhead, down to $28, 'feels like a 5-star hotel,' shoppers say
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the SparkPod High-Pressure Rain Shower Head, featuring 90 nozzles for a waterfall-like experience, at a discounted price. Installation is made easy and customers highlight improved shower experience and water pressure, with over 44,000 five-star ratings on Amazon.

articles.title: Tesla plans a dealership in Daytona Beach as part of a new LPGA area retail center
articles.author: Clayton Park
articles.summary: Tesla is planning a new dealership in Daytona Beach, featuring a showroom, service and parts departments, and a customer lounge. The dealership will be part of a retail center called The Cays. The new location will allow Daytona Beach residents to purchase and service Tesla vehicles, including Cybertrucks.

articles.title: Staggering humidifier deals in Debenhams sale slashing price to less than £30
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering the Neo Portable Compact Dehumidifier for £29.99, a 74% reduction from its usual price of £115.99. The 1500ml Neo dehumidifier is designed to remove excess moisture from homes or offices and is portable for use in various rooms.

articles.title: Looking to identify Canadian products? There's a shopping app for that
articles.author: Tara Deschamps
articles.summary: A new app has been launched to assist users in identifying and selecting Canadian-made products when foreign products are detected. The app offers a list of homegrown alternatives, aiming to support local brands amid souring relations between Canada and the U.S.

articles.title: This Robot Vacuums and Mops and Goes 60 Days Between Empties. Plus It's $300 Off Today
articles.author: Oliver Haslam
articles.summary: Shark is offering a significant price reduction on its Matrix Plus robot vacuum, bringing the price down to $400 from its usual $700. The Shark Matrix Plus features self-emptying capabilities for up to 60 days, LiDAR technology for navigation, CleanEdge Detect, Matrix Clean technology, HEPA filtration, and sonic mopping.

articles.title: Creating content on your phone? This tiny, rugged SSD belongs in your kit
articles.summary: Lexar has introduced the Lexar Go w/Hub, a compact portable SSD featuring up to 2TB of storage and extra USB Type-C ports. The device is designed for convenient use with phones, offering 10Gbps performance and an IP65 rating for moisture and dust resistance.

articles.title: Virgin Media launching product which more than doubles fastest broadband speed available in Ireland
articles.author: Emma Hanrahan
articles.summary: Virgin Media is launching a new broadband product that more than doubles the fastest broadband speed available in Ireland. The offering, aimed at bolstering national competitiveness, will be available in the second quarter of 2025.

articles.title: 30 Things From Wayfair To Help You Create The Cutest Nursery
articles.author: Kathleen Shea-Porter
articles.summary: Wayfair introduces a variety of baby and nursery products, including wallpaper, diaper caddies, convertible and mini cribs, dressers, rocking chairs, rugs, changing tables, crib sheets, mattresses, shelves, hampers, changing pad covers, clocks, night-lights, mobiles, and storage baskets. These products aim to enhance nursery design, functionality, and comfort for both parents and babies, with many items receiving positive customer reviews for ease of assembly, aesthetic appeal, and practical use.

articles.title: NTT DATA Launches Smart AI Agent™ to Accelerate Generative AI Adoption and Drive $2 Billion in Revenue by 2027
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NTT DATA has launched its next-generation Smart AI Agent™, an advanced AI tool designed to accelerate the adoption of Generative AI. The company aims to achieve $2 billion in revenue from Smart AI Agent™-related business by 2027.

articles.title: NTT DATA Launches Smart AI Agent™ to Accelerate Generative AI Adoption and Drive $2 Billion in Revenue by 2027
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NTT DATA launched its next-generation Smart AI Agent™, an advanced AI tool intended to accelerate the adoption of Generative AI. The company expects $2 billion in revenue from Smart AI Agent™-related business by 2027. The tool automates tasks and enhances efficiency across industries and will be rolled out to the US, China, and several European countries.

articles.title: NTT DATA Launches Smart AI Agent™ to Accelerate Generative AI Adoption and Drive $2 Billion in Revenue by 2027
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: NTT DATA launched its next-generation Smart AI Agent™ internationally. The company anticipates generating $2 billion in revenue from Smart AI Agent ™-related business by 2027.

articles.title: I ditched my trusted Dyson for a Miele vacuum — here's why
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Miele launched the Triflex HX2 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, boasting a VARTA Li-ion battery, flexible design, and powerful suction. It features a 3-in-1 arm for easy maneuverability and a HEPA filter for trapping dust particles, making it a versatile option for various cleaning needs.

articles.title: ACI launches new skincare brand Angelina
articles.author: Star Business Desk
articles.summary: ACI Limited launched 'Angelina Hyaluronic Booster', a new product under the Angelina range, targeting the growing skincare market. This product features next-generation formulations and aims to carve out a unique space in the market, catering to increasing skincare awareness among women.

articles.title: I Tried Using AI to Help With Graphics, but It Was a Bust
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: PosterMyWall, a graphic design hub, now offers new AI-powered tools, including an AI image generator, an AI background remover, and AI captions for social media posts. These features are accessible through a premium subscription.

articles.title: Where can I preorder the Nintendo Switch 2?
articles.author: Victoria Rosenthal
articles.summary: Walmart and Best Buy are already preparing for the launch of the Nintendo Switch 2. Customers can sign up for email notifications on their websites to receive updates about preorders and game releases for the upcoming console.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 'durable' car trash can for just $8, and shoppers say it's 'super useful'
articles.author: Victoria Garcia
articles.summary: K Knodel has launched its Waterproof Medium Car Trash Can, now available on Amazon for $8 (50% off). This product features adjustable straps, a waterproof liner, and multiple pockets. It's designed to keep car interiors clean and can also function as a cooler bag.

articles.title: Woman banned from assistive AI app after teaching it to say "arse"
articles.author: Thom Dunn
articles.summary: ElevenLabs offers a text-to-voice service that clones voices using generative AI. This service assists individuals with speech impairments, but the company's terms of service limit the type of content the cloned voice can say. Joyce Esser, a woman with Bulbar Motor Neuron Disease, uses ElevenLabs to communicate, highlighting both the benefits and limitations of this new service.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Expands its Western Canadian Footprint With All Calgary Co-op and Freson Bros. Stores Now Selling CWENCH Hydration™
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands Corporation announced the return of all four ready-to-drink flavors of its flagship product, Clearly Canadian, to Circle K locations. This expansion aims to offer greater access to Clearly Canadian beverages for consumers within the Circle K network across Western Canada.

articles.title: HUAWEI Mate XT: The world's first triple-foldable smartphone
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: HUAWEI has launched the Mate XT, the world's first commercial triple-foldable smartphone. It features a unique design with a 3K HUAWEI X-True Display that transforms into a tablet, an adjustable aperture camera, and a revolutionary hinge system. It is powered by a 5600mAh battery with HUAWEI SuperCharge support.

articles.title: Dyson vacuum under $300: Target cuts prices on top-selling Dyson V8 cordless vacuum
articles.author: Rachel Sandstrom Morrison
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum for $299.99, a $130 discount. The V8 Origin features 40 minutes of run time, a de-tangling Motorbar cleaner head, whole-machine filtration, and a combination tool exclusive to Target.

articles.title: Tesla introduces app based test drive experience in NI
articles.author: David Rankin
articles.summary: Tesla has launched its Self-Serve Test Drive experience in Bangor, Co Down, Northern Ireland, allowing customers to test drive Model 3 and Model Y vehicles without direct staff interaction. Customers can book and access the vehicles via the Tesla app or online at the Bloomfield Shopping Centre location. This service was first launched in the UK in 2023 and has expanded due to high demand.

articles.title: Save £40 on this easy-to-use coffee machine and shoppers say is 'brilliant'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: De'Longhi Magnifica Start bean to cup espresso machine is available for purchase. The coffee maker features a bean grinder, milk frother, and one-touch recipes for steam, espresso, coffee, and long drinks. It can be purchased from Amazon, Argos and De'Longhi website.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Expands its Western Canadian Footprint With All Calgary Co-op and Freson Bros. Stores Now Selling CWENCH Hydration™
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands has expanded the availability of its CWENCH Hydration sports drink to Calgary Co-op and Freson Bros. supermarkets across Alberta, Canada. Both RTD beverages and hydration mix packets are now available at Freson Bros., furthering Cizzle Brands' strategy to build a market presence for CWENCH Hydration across North America.

articles.title: DIY Tool Store Expands Range of Cordless Tools and Accessories to Support UK DIY Enthusiasts
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: DIY Tool Store has expanded its product range to include a broader selection of high-quality tools such as cordless chainsaws and cordless battery drills. The store aims to empower DIY enthusiasts and professionals across the UK with these new offerings. The expansion includes hand tools, power tools, garden tools, tool storage solutions and safety equipment.

articles.title: Anaplan achieves significant milestones in its multi-year business transformation
articles.summary: Anaplan launches a new brand with an updated visual identity, including a refined color palette and a dynamic logo. The company is also delivering a modern product UX/UI, offering a streamlined, content-focused experience with best-in-class usability. This is part of a $500 million product investment to fuel innovation.

articles.title: Amdocs Introduces Amdocs AI Factory, Empowering Service Providers to Monetize the Next Generation of AI Services
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amdocs launched its AI Factory to help service providers commercialize generative AI. This offering includes GPU as a Service, S/LLM as a service, and tailored applications. The end-to-end solution aims to enable service providers to address enterprise demand for AI and unlock new revenue streams.

articles.title: Amazon's 'perfect' jump starter kit hailed by delighted drivers after price slashed from £90
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: The NOCO Boost Sport Jump Starter is available at a discounted price on Amazon, offering a 500-amp lithium battery jump starter capable of up to 20 jump starts on a single charge. Beyond jump-starting cars, it functions as a portable power bank and LED flashlight, featuring an integrated 100-lumen LED flashlight and USB charging capabilities.

articles.title: Newegg Launches New NVIDIA RTX 5070 Ti GPUs and ABS Gaming PCs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg Commerce, Inc. is now offering the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 Ti GPUs. This launch follows the successful release of NVIDIA's RTX 5080 and RTX 5090 GPUs in January.

articles.title: Hot List: Weekender bags, compression socks and more spring travel essentials, starting at $7
articles.author: Danielle Murphy
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of travel-related products. It features a duffel bag with a spacious interior and shoe compartment, two-sided laundry bags for separating clean and dirty clothes, and compact pocket umbrellas with UV protection. Also featured are brightening capsules containing a fast-acting serum to target hyperpigmentation while on the go, and cleansing melts that hydrate skin.

articles.title: Chinese smartphone firm Oppo launches slim $1,870 folding phone to rival Samsung, Huawei
articles.author: Ryan Browne
articles.summary: Oppo introduced the Find N5, a new flagship folding phone, featuring a slim design and AI-powered capabilities, with a starting price of $1,867.70. The phone boasts a triple-camera setup with AI Telescope Zoom and an AI assistant for document summarization and translation. Additionally, Oppo launched the O+ Connect feature, enabling connectivity and remote control between the Find N5 and Mac computers.

articles.title: Burble Creativity Announces Mission-Driven Crowdfunding Campaign
articles.summary: Burble Creativity, Inc. is launching its flagship product, the Burble Story Tent, designed for children on the autism spectrum, leveraging patented MDI™ technology. The company is conducting a crowdfunding campaign to fund the production and delivery of the tents, with a price point under $500, and also plans to donate tents to autism nonprofits.

articles.title: Google brings Circle to Search to Chrome and the Google app on iOS
articles.author: Sunita
articles.summary: Google launched 'Search Screen with Google Lens' for Chrome and the Google app on iOS, allowing users to visually search by circling, drawing, or highlighting within images. This feature, rolling out globally, aims to streamline visual searches without needing screenshots or new tabs and Google Lens is getting AI Overviews to identify objects.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'compact and quiet' £49 dehumidifier and fights mould
articles.author: Tom Capon
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering the Russell Hobbs Fresh Air Mini Compact Dehumidifier for £49, lauded for combating humidity and condensation in small spaces. Amazon also sells it for £42.50. Alternatives such as the Newthinking Mini Electric Dehumidifier are also available on Amazon, and the Neo Portable Compact Dehumidifier is available at Debenhams.

articles.title: Molly-Mae Hague swears by this antibacterial make-up brush for flawless skin
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Morphe has launched a new antibacterial M103 Angled Cream and Liquid Foundation Brush. This brush features silver-ion infused bristles that reduce bacteria by 99.9% and is designed for seamless application of cream and liquid makeup. The new product is promoted by Molly-Mae Hague.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G battery life
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G smartphone.

articles.title: Motorola Dimensity 8200 phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G, a new flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G, aiming to redefine flagship smartphones.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G launch date
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G, signaling a new flagship smartphone. The launch aims to redefine the flagship smartphone category for Motorola.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G performance
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch its new flagship smartphone, the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G camera details
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola will launch the Motorola Edge 60 Ultra 5G, a new flagship smartphone. The launch signifies Motorola's attempt to redefine flagship smartphones.

articles.title: Finding new ways: NL's tech sector ready to adapt to tariff threats, new economic realities
articles.author: Gary Kean
articles.summary: PolyUnity, a company specializing in 3D-printed medical products such as bolus molds and specialized lab equipment, aims to strengthen its position in the Canadian healthcare sector. The company is creating products to exact customer specifications which optimize specimen analysis and storage. The renewed focus on buying Canadian may facilitate the adoption of PolyUnity's cost-effective solutions by overcoming existing contracts with American suppliers.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer £25 jeans 'better than expensive ones' and 'exactly what you want in jeans'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is selling Lily Slim Fit Jeans made with cotton-rich denim, boasting a slender fit and soft feel. The jeans, available in colors like Med Blue Denim and Black Mix, feature button and zip fastening. Customer reviews highlight the good fit and quality of the jeans, while some note changes in the fit compared to previous versions.

articles.title: I tried Ninja's new coffee machine and I've ditched buying Starbucks
articles.author: Ruth Ovens Head
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja Luxe Cafe Premier Espresso Machine, a new coffee machine with a built-in grinder, automated frothing settings, and various accessories. This machine allows users to craft barista-quality coffee at home, offering customizable settings and easy maintenance.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 5G
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new device aimed at revolutionizing the budget 5G smartphone market. This launch signals the introduction of a new product within Realme's portfolio.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 specifications
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new 5G smartphone, targeting the budget market.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 camera
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new 5G smartphone, aimed at revolutionizing the budget smartphone market.

articles.title: Realme smartphone under budget
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new budget 5G smartphone.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new 5G smartphone aimed at revolutionizing the budget market.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 leaks
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme Neo, a new device poised to revolutionize the budget 5G smartphone market.

articles.title: Instagram DMs get music stickers, pinned messages, QR codes for group chats, and more
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Instagram is introducing a batch of new features for its platform. The features will allow users more ways to create Reels and connect with followers.

articles.title: $20K foldable tiny home in a box you can set up in just 1 hour
articles.author: Kevin
articles.summary: Boxabl has introduced the Baby Box, an ultra-compact, foldable, and climate-controlled tiny home that can be set up quickly. The Baby Box includes a living area with a convertible sofa bed, a kitchen with induction stove, refrigerator, sink, USB outlets, and a bathroom with toilet and shower. Priced initially at $19,999, it targets minimalists, remote workers, and those needing emergency housing.

articles.title: $20K foldable tiny home in a box you can set up in just 1 hour
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Boxabl has introduced the Baby Box, a foldable tiny home priced at an introductory $19,999. The Baby Box can be set up by one person in 60 minutes and includes features like a convertible sofa, kitchen appliances, and a bathroom with a skylight, suitable for off-grid living and disaster relief.

articles.title: $20K foldable tiny home in a box you can set up in just 1 hour
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Boxabl introduces the Baby Box, a foldable tiny home, priced at an introductory $19,999, designed for mobility and ease of installation. The Baby Box is equipped with features like a multipurpose sofa bed, a kitchen, a bathroom, and compatibility with solar power systems, making it suitable for off-grid living and emergency housing.

articles.title: New Study Reveals the Impact of Relevant Advertising in Cultural Moments
articles.author: Bill Bradley
articles.summary: Sightly's "Brand Mentality" platform helps brands align with real-time cultural moments by transforming a brand's profile into a real-time algorithm. This approach, according to a Magna Media Trials study, can significantly boost purchase intent and search intent. Sightly's CEO emphasizes that moving quickly around appropriate moments and understanding brand identity is key to delivering impactful messaging.

articles.title: Boost Mobile to Offer All-New iPhone 16e
articles.author: Echo Star Corporation
articles.summary: iPhone 16 is available for Pre-Order starting February 21. Boost Mobile offers the iPhone 16e for $199.99 to new customers who port their number and subscribe to Boost's Unlimited Premium plan.

articles.title: Mahindra Scorpio N Pickup Truck Interiors Spotted Ahead of Launch: A Closer Look at the Upcoming Utility Vehicle
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Mahindra is preparing to launch a new Scorpio N-based pickup truck. The new Mahindra Scorpio N pickup's details and features are currently anticipated.

articles.title: Emerging brands drive consumer growth in China
articles.summary: Pop Mart introduced toys inspired by "Ne Zha 2" and Labubu, achieving significant revenue growth. Unitree Robotics launched H1 humanoid robots and quadruped robots, with the latter gaining popularity and selling thousands of units monthly. Chi Forest introduced sugar-free beverages featuring traditional Chinese health concepts, achieving over 100 million yuan in sales within four months.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a ‘luxury' tiny home for $11,520 – it has up to 3 bedrooms and buyers love ‘key attraction'
articles.author: Rhiannon Oliver
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a new product: a customizable prefab container tiny home priced at $11,520. The home features customizable layouts with up to three bedrooms, high-transmittance glass windows, a fully equipped bathroom, and a kitchen with sleek cabinets. Its foldable design allows for fast and easy installation, and it can be used as a long-term living solution or to extend existing properties.

articles.title: Korea move: Genesis of a new era
articles.author: Damien Tomlinson
articles.summary: Genesis has upgraded and relaunched the GV70 and GV80 for 2025. The GV70 Signature Sport has a price of about $112,500, while the GV80 Luxury 3.5T AWD costs approximately $143,000; both models feature a 3.5-liter V6 engine, advanced technology, and updated designs, including remote smart parking assistance. The GV80 also offers features like power folding third-row seating and passenger talk.

articles.title: Subway officially opens in former McDonald's unit
articles.author: Liam Fitzpatrick
articles.summary: Subway has opened a new branch in Watford town centre, marking its fourth location in the area. The new eatery is located in The Parade, in a unit previously occupied by McDonald's. This new Subway offers customers another location to purchase their sandwiches.

articles.title: The 99p buy people are swearing by to clear clogged drains, and you can even pick it up in Home Bargains
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Kilrock Cleaning Products' Slam Plughole Unblocker, available at Home Bargains for 99p, is a drain unblocker that dissolves hair, grease, and soap scum. Users report the product is effective for unblocking drains quickly and efficiently.

articles.title: The 99p buy people are swearing by to clear clogged drains, and you can even pick it up in Home Bargains
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Kilrock Cleaning Products' Slam Plughole Unblocker, available at Home Bargains for 99p, is recommended for unclogging blocked drains. Users report that the product effectively dissolves hair, grease, and soap scum to quickly unblock drains, even when other methods fail.

articles.title: NatWest launches 'Sustainability Solutions' platform to support businesses net zero efforts
articles.summary: NatWest Group launched a new online platform this week. The platform offers free tools and advice to business customers. This platform helps assess savings, costs, and impacts related to adopting clean technologies.

articles.title: Discover similar products on Meesho like a pro
articles.summary: Meesho's Android app is enhanced with new features for product discovery. Badges like 'trending' and 'bestseller' provide social proof, while the '+5 more' option allows users to easily explore product variants within the app.

articles.title: Lidl Romania opens two stores in Cisnădie and Hârșova
articles.author: Nine O' Clock
articles.summary: Lidl Romania opened two new stores on February 20th in Cisnădie, Sibiu County, and Hârșova, Constanța County. The Cisnădie store is located on Cindrelu Street, No. 45.

articles.title: Pokémon Presents Announced for Next Week
articles.author: Oliver Brandt
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company will host a Pokémon Presents livestream on February 27, 2025, to announce updates for its games. The presentation is expected to feature new information on Pokémon Legends: Z-A, scheduled for release in 2025 for the Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: Popular Philips wet and dry shaver is better than half-price
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Philips Electric Shaver 3000 Series is available on Amazon with a 54% discount. The shaver works in both wet and dry conditions, has SkinProtect technology, self-sharpening PowerCut blades, and a 5D pivot. It includes a pop-up precision trimmer and a rechargeable battery, with blades lasting up to two years.

articles.title: Smart Household: Floor Care Is Child's Play With the New FLOOR ONE S7 STRETCH Ultra From Tineco
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching the FLOOR ONE S7 STRETCH Ultra wet/dry vacuum cleaner in Europe starting February 20, 2025. This appliance features improved functionalities compared to its predecessor, the FLOOR ONE STRETCH S6. The FLOOR ONE S7 STRETCH Ultra will be available for purchase on Tineco's website and major retailers.

articles.title: Adobe secures data collaborations between brands, publishers with new tool
articles.author: Chris Kelly
articles.summary: Adobe launched Real-Time CDP Collaboration, enabling brands and publishers to better partner for first-party data collaborations. The offering provides a clean room environment for audience identification and activation across channels, and allows measurement of ad effectiveness directly with publishers. Advertisers like The Coca-Cola Company, GroupM Wavemaker, and Warner Bros. Discovery have piloted the Adobe new product.

articles.title: What's the difference between Windows and ChromeOS?
articles.author: Aleksha McLoughlin
articles.summary: Microsoft launched Windows 11 in October 2021, succeeding Windows 10, offering a straightforward user experience. Google released ChromeOS in 2011 alongside first-generation Google Chromebooks, positioning it as a lightweight, web-based alternative, integrating with Google accounts and the Google Play Store for applications. These operating systems are frequently updated for new features.

articles.title: Kruger&Matz Flow 11 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Kruger&Matz announced the Flow 11 smartphone in Q1 2024, featuring a 6.56-inch display, Unisoc SC9863A processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, a 13MP rear camera, and a 5MP front camera. The phone runs on Android 13 and includes a 4000 mAh battery with 10W wired charging, with prices starting at P3,905.49.

articles.title: Samsung Begins One UI 7 Development for Galaxy Z Fold7
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung has commenced One UI 7 development for the Galaxy Z Fold7, signaling software testing for its next-generation foldable smartphone lineup. The company is also expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Flip7 and the Galaxy Z Flip FE later this year. The Galaxy Z Flip FE is rumored to be a budget-friendly foldable 'Fan Edition' device.

articles.title: Doratoon Unveils AI-Powered PPT and Animation Features to Enhance Content Creation Efficiency
articles.summary: Doratoon has launched new AI-powered PPT generation and AI animation features designed to enhance content creation efficiency and user creativity. The AI PPT feature generates presentations from a topic input, while the AI animation tool creates engaging videos with templates. These features are available to users in business, education, and personal projects.

articles.title: Watch the Oppo Find N5 Global Launch Event Live
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is launching its latest foldable smartphone, the Find N5, at an event in Singapore. The Find N5 is the successor to the Find N3 and is expected to be the thinnest book-style foldable yet, featuring premium design and color options like Dusk Purple, Satin Black, and Jade White.

articles.title: ‘I don't know how my house was clean without it!' Dunelm fans rave about scrubber that ‘makes cleaning a lot easier'
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Dunelm is retailing the Hurricane Spin Scrubber for £40. The product is a cordless, rechargeable scrubber designed to blast through soap scum, mildew, and hard water stains. Equipped with three interchangeable heads, it can clean both indoor and outdoor surfaces, receiving positive reviews from customers citing its ease of use and effectiveness.

articles.title: You Can Now Smell Like a Dunkin' With Donut-Scented Shampoo and Conditioner
articles.author: Jackson Jackson Published:
articles.summary: Dunkin' and Native have partnered to introduce limited-edition, donut-inspired scented shampoos and conditioners. These products, featuring scents like Boston creme, were initially launched on January 5 at Walmart and the Native online store and are priced between $10 and $14.

articles.title: Adobe Photoshop celebrates 35 Years of Creative Excellence and Digital Innovation
articles.summary: Adobe Photoshop celebrated its 35th anniversary, marking a milestone in digital imaging and design. Throughout its history, Photoshop has introduced groundbreaking innovations such as Layers, Adjustment Layers, the Liquify Filter, the Healing Brush, Content-Aware Fill, Generative Fill powered by Adobe Firefly and expanding to platforms like iPad and the web.  Adobe also launched Lightroom to complement Photoshop for photographers.

articles.title: AI agents have clear mission, hazy business model
articles.author: Karen Kwok
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing or adopting AI agents to enhance their services and operations. Lufthansa utilizes an AI chatbot for instant flight rebooking, while Pandora employs "Gemma" to assist customers with purchases. Microsoft integrates AI features into its Microsoft 365 suite, and other companies like SAP offer Agentic AI tools to improve flaw detection, showcasing the growing trend of integrating AI agents into various business sectors.

articles.title: Standard Chartered Delivers First Multi-Country Sustainability-Linked Trade Finance Facility to Siemens Energy
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Standard Chartered announced the successful launch of a new product or service.

articles.title: I Explored The Depths Of Amazon's 'Internet Famous' List And Found These 32 Cool Beauty Products For You
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly introduced or popular beauty and skincare products. These include the Olay Super Serum Body Wash, Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Mist Oil, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, L'Oréal Paris Makeup True Match Lumi Glotion, Medicube Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer, Joesoef's pharmaceutical-grade anti-acne sulfur soap, and Gloves In A Bottle lotion, addressing a variety of skincare and beauty needs. The article also featured many products and service from the company Maybelline, E.l.f., Clinique, Sol de Janeiro, Lumify, NYX, Laneige, Mixsoon, Lawless, Skala, Embryolisse, Palmer's, Salt & Stone

articles.title: Sitecore Updates Its Digital Experience Platform and Content Management System for Marketers
articles.summary: Sitecore has introduced over 250 innovations to its digital experience platform (DXP) and content management system (CMS), including advancements in Sitecore Stream AI capabilities. These updates offer new tools for brand management, A/B testing in XM Cloud, and enhanced asset management. Sitecore's enhancements aim to help marketers create and optimize digital experiences.

articles.title: Adobe Releases Real-Time CDP Collaboration
articles.summary: Adobe released Adobe Real-Time CDP Collaboration, a new product built on Adobe Experience Platform that enables advertisers and publishers to securely collaborate on first-party data to identify high-value audiences and activate campaigns without exposing customer data. The solution allows users to connect with trusted partners, leverage existing audiences, maximize audience discovery, and measure campaign performance through actionable insights.

articles.title: 32 Routine-Upgrading Things For Anyone Who Lives Alone
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights several products available on Amazon, including the "Click & Carry Grocery Bag Carrier" from Shark Tank, the "Souper Cubes" also seen on Shark Tank, and the "MicrowavaBowl". Other mentioned products are, a stair-climbing trolley dolly, a no-scrub weekly shower cleaner, and a mini air fryer from Cosori.

articles.title: La Casera unveils new look for SMOOV chapman
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: The La Casera Company PLC rebranded its SMOOV Chapman drink in Nigeria. Managing Director Chinedum Okereke unveiled the refreshed label at a ceremony in Lagos, emphasizing the tagline 'Fresh LabelSame Original TasteSMOOVIT'.

articles.title: Sandakan poly wins Best Product Award
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
org: Department of Polytechnic and Community College Education
articles.summary: Politeknik Sandakan Sabah (PSS) won the Best Product Award for showcasing four innovative food products at the Apprentice PolyCC Product Challenge. The products included High Fibre Cookies, Instant Creamy Scallop Soup, Fish Choc Chip Cookies, and Shrimpzest Premix Powder, developed under the guidance of their lecturers.

articles.title: Laguna Burger opens sixth location
articles.author: Nakayla MCCLELLAND
articles.summary: Laguna Burger, managed by Fuego Enterprises and a subsidiary of Laguna Development Corp., has opened its sixth location in Albuquerque's Bricklight District near the University of New Mexico. The new location will offer student specials, including a $10.99 smash burger and smothered breakfast burrito, and plans to eventually offer a full-service bar stocked with local brews. Laguna Development Corp. plans to open another Laguna Burger location in the second quarter of 2025 at the Albuquerque International Sunport and is seeking out other opportunities throughout the state or regionally.

articles.title: Sliding into DMs just got better with Instagram's latest update
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Instagram is rolling out new features for its direct messaging system. This update introduces new functionalities to the existing messaging service.

articles.title: GrandTech Cloud (Singapore)'s 'Pizza Blitz' Campaign – To Introduce 'A Friend to Startups' to Singapore's Startup Scene
articles.summary: GrandTech Cloud Services (GCS) launched a 'Pizza Blitz' campaign in Singapore to introduce its F2SU platform, which supports startup growth. The campaign involves delivering pizzas to startups, influencers, and VCs to create engagement and showcase how F2SU helps with resources, market expansion, and cloud cost optimization.

articles.title: GrandTech Cloud (Singapore)'s "Pizza Blitz" Campaign – To Introduce "A Friend to Startups" to Singapore's Startup Scene
articles.author: Grandtech Cloud Services
articles.summary: GrandTech Cloud Services (GCS) launched "Pizza Blitz" in Singapore to introduce F2SU, a platform designed to support startup growth. The campaign involves delivering pizzas to startups, influencers, and VCs to showcase how F2SU can help them connect with resources, accelerate market expansion, and optimize cloud costs.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy A06 5G smartphone, price starts from Rs 10,499
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy A06 5G smartphone, starting from Rs 10,499, with three variants based on RAM and memory configurations. The device features a 6.7-inch HD+ display, a 50MP rear camera, and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, running on Samsung One UI 7 based on Android 15.

articles.title: Apple unveils budget version of iPhone 16 at $599
articles.author: Allen Cone
articles.summary: Apple unveiled the iPhone 16e, a new model in the iPhone family. This model will be priced lower than other iPhones while still including new features.

articles.title: Eufy's latest smart lock is literally a palm reader
articles.author: Ben Patterson
articles.summary: Eufy is launching the FamiLock S3 Max, a smart lock that uses palm scanning for unlocking. This new model, available for pre-order next month, employs near-infrared light to scan the sub veins of a palm for biometric authentication.

articles.title: 32 Products On Amazon's 'Trending' List That You Probably Haven't Seen Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: NYX launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum, providing 12-hour hydration. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Lawless released "Forget The Filler," a lip plumper containing shea butter, hyaluronic acid, and a stimulating peptide complex.

articles.title: Where to pre-order Apple iPhone 16e
articles.author: Troy Nankervis
articles.summary: Apple has unveiled the iPhone 16e, a new low-cost member of the iPhone 16 family, starting at $999. Pre-orders begin February 22nd, and it will be available for sale from February 28th. The iPhone 16e features an A18 chip, Apple Intelligence (AI), long battery life, and a 48MP 2-in-1 camera system and is available in matte black and white finishes.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 삼성전자, 2025년형 ‘비스포크 AI 식기세척기' 신제품 출시
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching the 2025 'Bespoke AI Dishwasher' lineup on [Date: June 21]. The new dishwashers feature enhanced 'AI Custom Wash+' functionality, a minimalist design, and improved energy efficiency. The price ranges from 1.21 million won to 2.36 million won.

articles.title: Valve says you're now free to build your own games atop Team Fortress 2.
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Valve released an SDK for Team Fortress 2 (TF2). The SDK empowers mod makers to significantly alter the game. TF2 mods developed with the SDK can be published on the Steam Store as new games.

articles.title: Nando's launches new face cream made with garlic and black pepper for 'smooth skin'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Nando's is launching a new skincare product, the Extra Creamy Face Cream, inspired by their Creamy Salad Dressing. This face cream contains ingredients like garlic and black pepper and will be available for a limited time on the Nando's website.

articles.title: Nando's launches new skin cream made with garlic and black pepper
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Nando's is launching a new skincare product, the Extra Creamy Face Cream, inspired by their Creamy Salad Dressing. This face cream contains ingredients like garlic and black pepper and will be available for a limited time on the Nando's website, starting February 26th.

articles.title: Council Post: The Future Of AI Agents In Customer Engagement
articles.author: Shubham Nigam
articles.summary: Questera AI's insights indicate AI agents are becoming the backbone of effective customer interaction tactics by providing 24/7 availability, instant responses, and scalability. They also hyper-personalize customer interactions using consumer data, leading to improved customer retention and data insights. AI agents reduce human errors and lighten small teams, changing customer interaction rules.

articles.title: Council Post: AI-Powered Customer Service: A New Era
articles.author: Mukul Garg
articles.summary: Salesforce introduced Einstein GPT, an AI platform automating customer service tasks. Klarna uses an AI assistant equivalent to 700 full-time agents. Comcast developed the "Ask Me Anything" feature, reducing time per conversation. These AI-driven solutions are reshaping customer service by improving efficiency and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: ION Commodities transforms grain and oilseed merchandising with the relaunch of Agtech
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ION Commodities relaunched Agtech, a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution. Agtech aims to transform grain and oilseed merchandising and trading. This relaunch reaffirms ION Commodities' dedication to innovation in the agricultural industry.

articles.title: New Switch OLED Bundle Leaks Online
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to release a new Nintendo Switch OLED bundle.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers say 'I need' after spotting limited edition Cadbury treat ahead of Pancake Day
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing a new treat in its Special Buys this month.

articles.title: Best Sneaker Drops from NBA All-Star Weekend 2025: How To Buy Online
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Nike released new sneaker drops.

articles.title: Oppo's Find N5 Is World's Thinnest Foldable, And Plays Nice With Mac Too
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The product utilizes the newest Qualcomm chip and features IPX9 water resistance, suggesting an emphasis on performance and durability.

articles.title: Krystal Biotech shares rise 20% following earnings call
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: The company plans to launch Vyjuvek in the EU and Japan in 2025. This represents a market expansion for the product.

articles.title: Ninja Swirl by CREAMi Ice Cream Maker: Reviews, Buy In Stock Online
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced its latest product, the Swirl by CREAMi.
